tradestock.model.tradeoperation

Interface TradeOperation<K>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - object type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockModel, TradeModel

    public interface TradeOperation<K>
    This interface represent a TradeOperation. A TradeOperation model could create portfolio, but stocks, get cost, get value, get portfolio list, and get portfolio state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Buy a stock at date.

      Return portfolio state of given name.
      java.lang.String getPortfolioStateByDate(java.lang.String portfolioName, java.time.LocalDate date)
      Return portfolio state of given name at certain date.
      double getTotalCostBasis(java.lang.String portfolioName)
      Return total stocks cost at present in given portfolio.

    • Method Detail

      • createPortfolio

        void createPortfolio(java.lang.String portfolioName)
        Create a portfolio by given name. If name is null or empty string, or name already exists, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - portfolio name

      • buy

        void buy(java.lang.String portfolioName,
         java.lang.String stockSymbol,
         java.time.LocalDate date,
         double number)
        Buy a stock at date. If portfolio name is null or empty string, or portfolio name does not exist, or stock symbol is null or empty string, or date is null, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - given portfolio name
        stockSymbol - given stock symbol
        date - given date
        number - given number

      • getTotalCostBasis

        double getTotalCostBasis(java.lang.String portfolioName)
        Return total stocks cost at present in given portfolio. If portfolio dose not exist, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - given portfolio
        Returns:
        total stocks cost at present

      • getTotalCostBasisByDate

        double getTotalCostBasisByDate(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                               java.time.LocalDate date)
        Return total stocks cost at certain date in given portfolio. Transactions after given date will not affect the result. If date is null, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - given portfolio
        date - given date
        Returns:
        total stocks cost at certain date

      • getTotalValue

        double getTotalValue(java.lang.String portfolioName)
        Return total stocks value at present in given portfolio. If portfolio dose not exist, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - given portfolio
        Returns:
        total stocks value at present

      • getTotalValueByDate

        double getTotalValueByDate(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                           java.time.LocalDate date)
        Return total stocks value at certain date in given portfolio. Transactions after given date will not affect the result. If date is null, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - given portfolio
        date - given date
        Returns:
        total stocks value at certain date

      • getPortfolioList

        java.lang.String getPortfolioList()
        Return all the portfolio name as a string.
        Returns:
        all the portfolio name

      • getPortfolioState

        java.lang.String getPortfolioState(java.lang.String portfolioName)
        Return portfolio state of given name.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - given portfolio name
        Returns:
        portfolio state of given name

      • getPortfolioStateByDate

        java.lang.String getPortfolioStateByDate(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                                         java.time.LocalDate date)
        Return portfolio state of given name at certain date.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - given portfolio name
        date - given date
        Returns:
        portfolio state of given name at certain date
